description.raw:
This started out as a simple implementation of wireframe rendering, and then became complicated when I started writing a test for it. The crux of the problem centered around creating multiple render contexts in the same process. I didn't quite solve this problem, but made some solid advances in that direction and fixed a few bugs along the way. 

So, there is now a MainWindow_TEST that can be used to test various aspects of the GUI main window. It's primary limitation is that the test cannot be used with a world that requires and off-screen render buffer.

title.raw: Allow rendering of models in wireframe.
